instruction: You turned on PowerCool in the refrigerator. What happens next? A) The refrigerator will always stay at maximum cooling. B) After a few hours, it returns to the previous temperature. C) The refrigerator stops working completely.

A person left the fridge door open for a long time. What will likely happen? A) The temperature inside will rise and food may spoil. B) The refrigerator will automatically close the door. C) The temperature will drop further.
The fridge was placed directly against the wall. What is the result? A) Ventilation may be blocked, increasing energy use. B) The fridge will run quieter. C) It will last longer.
The power cord of the fridge is damaged. What should be done? A) Replace the cord only at a service center. B) Wrap it with tape and keep using it. C) The fridge can work without a cord.
Raw meat was placed on the top shelf without a container. What may happen? A) Other food may get contaminated. B) The meat will last longer. C) The meat will freeze instantly.
